alert.note: Alert for Eastern Alaska Range (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 03 at 4:34PM AKDT until November 04 at 12:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with areas of low visibility. Storm total accumulations 8 to 11 inches. North winds 20 to 40 mph. Visibility one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...Eastern Alaska Range. * WHEN...Until noon AKDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Visibility will be reduced and snow drifts will form. Travel could be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will continue through Friday morning, then taper off Friday afternoon. Blowing snow with visibility less than one half a mile at times will occur through Friday morning south of Trims Camp.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
